name: mascot-figma-plugin
description: Mascot - AI mascot generation plugin for Figma

scripts.build: npm run build:code && npm run build:ui && npm run copy:html
scripts.copy:html: cp src/ui/index.html ui.html && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const html=fs.readFileSync('ui.html','utf-8');const js=fs.readFileSync('ui.js','utf-8');const newHtml=html.replace(/<!-- ui.js will be inlined here during build -->/g, '<script>'+js+'</script>');fs.writeFileSync('ui.html',newHtml,'utf-8');console.log('âœ“ Inlined ui.js into ui.html');"
